name: Necromancer Bob
description:
This is the story of how Necromancer Bob saves his castle and his lands.

Journey through the game killing enemies through melee and turn-based battles.

Make new followers, find keys to unlock the new areas, find souls to increase your damage, and then fight the boss after defeating enough enemies!

Fewest deaths to complete the game wins.

Gain health every time you defeat an enemy. Game saves automatically if downloaded.
